-- Get monthly spending for last N months
WITH monthly_totals AS (
  SELECT 
    TO_CHAR(date, 'YYYY-MM') as month,
    SUM(ABS(amount)) as total_spent
  FROM finance.transactions
  WHERE date >= (NOW() AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Dubai')::date - INTERVAL '{{ $json.query.months || 3 }} months'
  GROUP BY TO_CHAR(date, 'YYYY-MM')
  ORDER BY month DESC
),
category_breakdown AS (
  SELECT 
    TO_CHAR(date, 'YYYY-MM') as month,
    category,
    SUM(ABS(amount)) as amount
  FROM finance.transactions
  WHERE date >= (NOW() AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Dubai')::date - INTERVAL '{{ $json.query.months || 3 }} months'
    AND category IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY TO_CHAR(date, 'YYYY-MM'), category
)
SELECT 
  mt.month,
  mt.total_spent,
  jsonb_object_agg(cb.category, cb.amount) FILTER (WHERE cb.category IS NOT NULL) as category_breakdown
FROM monthly_totals mt
LEFT JOIN category_breakdown cb ON mt.month = cb.month
GROUP BY mt.month, mt.total_spent
ORDER BY mt.month;
